SELECT A.ROUT_ID, A.NODE_ID, A.NODE_SN, A.NODE_NM, A.NODE_TYPE, A.LINK_ID, A.STTN_ID, A.STTN_NO, A.CRS_ID, A.GPS_X, A.GPS_Y, A.LINK_NODE_YN, B.MORN_STD FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST R ON A.ROUT_ID = R.ROUT_ID AND R.DEL_YN !='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID AND A.LINK_ID = B.LINK_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID}
ORDER BY NODE_SN
mapper.delete:
UPDATE BMS_NODE_MST A INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN B ON A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID SET A.USE_YN='N' WHERE B.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID};
DELETE FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN WHERE ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID};

UPDATE BMS_LINK_MST A INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN B ON A.LINK_ID = B.LINK_ID SET A.USE_YN='N' WHERE B.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID};
DELETE FROM BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN WHERE ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID}
